outcome: Branch B: Security lockdown and aggressive containment are imposed by the Directorate, forcing visible social order—but backlash grows as heavy-handed tactics deepen divides between citizens and the ruling elite. Resistance and suspicion take root.

events.description: The Directorate declares an emergency: critical BCI functions isolated, severe restrictions on movement, and curfews enforced with drones. Checkpoints multiply. Citizens are required to wear special ID bands.

A masked protest erupts in an industrial zone after families are separated by BCI malfunctions. Security uses crowd dispersal tech; images of children behind barricades spread online, fueling outrage.

Council panic as Innovator members leak evidence of Directorate’s tampering with BCI protocols. Containment failures are blamed on military overreach, deepening factional rifts and undermining legitimacy.

Posters appear across the city depicting Directorate leaders as puppets of a broken machine. Unrest grows in markets and transit hubs. Anonymous messages urge civil disobedience against the ongoing lockdown.
